cl-yautils » Function

  1. Overview
  2. Install
  3. Function
  4. Macro
  5. Variable
average(lst)
Get the average of a number lst.
random-integer(small large &optional seed)
Get a random integer between small and large.

(load "cl-yautils.lisp")

(use-package 'cl-yautils)

;; Simulate main function.
(defun main ()
              ;; Get a random integer
              ;;  with an internal random seed.
  (prog ((num (random-integer 1 100)))
    (if (evenp num)
        (format t "~d is even~%" num)
        (format t "~d is odd~%" num)))
  (finish-output)  ; Trick for Clozure CL.
  (quit-with-status))
puts(obj)
Print obj to standard output with trailing newline.

(load "cl-yautils.lisp")

(use-package 'cl-yautils)

;; Simulate main function.
(defun main ()
  (puts "你好，世界")
  (puts "こんにちは世界")
  (puts "안녕 세상")
  (finish-output)  ; Trick for Clozure CL.
  (quit-with-status 0))
perror(obj)
Print obj to standard error with trailing newline.
argument-vectornil
Unprocessed argv (argument vector)
argument-scriptnil
Processed command-line argument(s) in scripting mode.
platformnil
Detect platform type in a portable way.
The flags emitted by platform the function:
  • :windows
  • :macos
  • :linux
  • :unix
quit-with-status(&optional status)
Quit a program with optional exit status in a portable way.
compile-program(program main)
Compile a program to an executable. Support SBCL, CCL and CLISP.

(load "cl-yautils.lisp")

(use-package 'cl-yautils)

(defun main ()
  (puts "Hello World")
  (finish-output)  ; Trick for Clozure CL.
  (quit-with-status 0))

(if (equal :windows (platform))
    (defvar *program* "program.exe")
    (defvar *program* "program"))

(compile-program *program* #'main)
(quit-with-status)
